name: Dennis Bergendorf
text: Went to my local Marco's and told a twit of a kid I wanted a medium pizza. He didn't say a word, but rang it up. I came back a few minutes later and he handed me a small sack. I asked if that was really a pizza and he said I'd ordered a sub â€¦More

name: Pam Hodges
text: I'm not a big pizza person. But the chicken club sandwich is the best. My granddaughter is right there with me.

name: Jacob Hodge
text: I've been working her for 7 months and it's been a great experience. Awesome co-workers and good food.

name: John Flop
text: Amazing pizza! Super fast! Awesome flavor and great quality! Will be back!

name: James Rossiter
text: Awesome service and food at a great price!

name: gene tolen
text: The website does not work like it is supposed to. Very confusing and delivery is put in as carry out. Last time I give them a chance after 3 times having an issue.

name: Brian George
text: Love it. Good place good ppl all wes makes thangs right with u

name: Tracy Howe
text: Excellent clean friendly fast courteous understanding patient kind WTG!!!!  Definitely coming back

name: Brad Weaver
text: Employees ..handle cash..there cell phones..boxes..share the register.. Hands all over everything..no one wore gloves ,hair nets ,,beard nets ..absolutely GROSS. And this is just what I seen in min hmmm...no GLOVES.NO HAIR NETS..NO BEARD NETS.yea Im good with not going back..B.WEAVER
